title: The default value set in list box of report parameter lost after modifying the default value
description: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is not being retained after modifying the default value.
EB: The default value 'aaa' should be retained in the list box after modifying the default value. The OK button should be disabled after step 5.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the report parameter settings.
2. Set the default value of the list box to 'aaa'.
3. Modify the value of the list box to 'bbb'.
4. Save the changes.
5. Verify that the default value is not retained and the OK button is still enabled.
